Hanzi: 啸

歗字的基本解释

歗
xiào
古同“啸”：“歗歌伤怀，念彼硕人。”

歗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiào］
［《廣韻》蘇弔切，去嘯，心。］
亦作“歗1”。亦作“哨3”。“啸1”的繁体字。
(1)撮口吹出声音。
(2)鸟兽长声鸣叫。
(3)称其他尖利而悠长的响声。
(4)呼唤。
(5)招集；聚集。
[②]［chì］
［《集韻》尺栗切，入質，昌。］
“啸2”的繁体字。通“叱1”。
大声呼喝。

歗字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【欠字部】　歗； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页572第15
【玉篇】【廣韻】【集韻】?與嘯同。【說文】吟也。【詩·王風】條其歗矣。【毛傳】條條然歗也。歗，籀文嘯字。

歗字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
歗字的起名意思

古同“啸”，比喻清脆而悠长的声音。

Xiao
Basic explanation of words
Xiao
xiào
Gu Tong's "Xiao": "Xiaoge is sad, and misses the other Shuo people."
Xiao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiào］
["Guangyun" Su Diaoqie, go to whistle, heart. ]
Also known as "歗1". Also known as "Whistle 3". Traditional characters for "啸1".
(1) Pinch the mouth to blow out the sound.
(2) Birds and beasts call long.
(3) Call other sharp and long noises.
(4) Call.
(5) Recruitment; gather.
[②]［chì］
["Jiyun" Chili cut, enter the quality, prosperous. ]
The traditional characters of "啸2". Pass "叱1".
Shout loudly.
Xiao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Own Words] 　歗; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 572 No. 15
[Jade articles] [Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Same as Xiao. [Said Wen] Yin Ye. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】It's all about it. [Mao Biography] All the people are all alone. Xiao, Xiaowen Xiaozi.
Xiao
